title: Should there be more decimal places available when deciding wearable prices?
body:
> by 0x19e167ae860d92f6d1e4c723c732238f62ae4f82 (tim#4f82)

It seems useful to allow for more granular control over the prices of wearables and collectibles. Here are some potential reasons:

*   someone might want to host a giveaway but wants to prevent bots from rapidly claiming free items (0.001 MANA instead of 0 MANA)
*   as the price of MANA increases, the least expensive items also become more expensive, increasing the bar to entry

- Yes
- No
- Invalid question/options
